reuters.title: ROYAL BANK OF CANADA 1ST QTR SHR 88 CTS VS 1.22 DLRS
reuters.body: Shr 8.17 dlrs vs 55 cts Net 67.7 mln vs 4.5 mln Revs 3.67 billion vs 3.54 billion Year Shr 12.19 dlrs vs 24.00 dlrs Net 101.1 mln vs 199.0 mln Revs 14.33 billion vs 13.35 billion Note: 90 pct owned by Ford Motor Co <F> Reuter 
